altername_name: Mr. Bean's Wacky World of Wii
name: Mr. Bean's Wacky World
overview: Enter the wonderful, Wacky World of Mr. Bean - one of the best known and most lovable characters who is popular with kids of all ages! Experience 12 levels and over 20 mini-games of fun and action-packed gameplay! Features • 12 fun-packed levels full of cunning puzzles, crazy traps, and wacky enemies! • Two players can play against each other in over 20 mini-games!
